about_the_game:
Cliffsides – Think Outside Of the Box

Welcome to Cliffsides, a game where you build a city in a unique environment that will truly test your skills in space management to their limits! While the natural beauty of the locations for your urban projects may be distracting, you'll need all the focus you can muster.

Building In 3d

Your designated building sites will be full of cliffs and rocky outcrops, as promised in the game's title. This calls for a great deal of engineering ingenuity. Construct homes right on the steep slopes of tiny islands along with all the necessary ramps and quays for your residents' convenience

A Sea Of Opportunities

You might ask – what's the point of investing in such an area and establishing a township there? There is the sea, for one thing. Develop fishing industries, harvest it for many other resources, use the very tides and winds it brings to generate power sustainably. You might even transform your modest town into a hub of maritime logistics!

Tourist Paradise?

If heavy industry isn't your thing, how about a different challenge? The amazing climate and beautiful environment mentioned in the beginning are sure to draw some visitors to your city. It's a perfect opportunity to transform it into a tourist resort! But with that come the extra responsibilities – you have to look out for the tourists as well as the town's inhabitants. Speaking of which...

A Stylish Kind Of town

Make sure to aim for balance as you expand your unique city. See to your residents' needs and safety – make sure they have access to the right commodities and services. Otherwise, you may not be in charge for long! Cliffsides is also a place where your creativity may work wonders. Use the Mediterranean setting and the characteristic architecture of your buildings to genuinely make what your create one of the most pleasant places to live!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Graphics: 2GB / Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GeForce GTX660
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz

short_description: Create a place like no other in Cliffsides! In this management simulator, you're in charge of building up a seaside city and then supervising its day-to-day workings. Tourism, industry, and a heap of meticulous space management. All in a charming Mediterranean setting!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
